scripts.init: npm install && git submodule update --init --recursive && haxelib newrepo && haxelib install --always etc/hxml/base.hxml && haxelib install --always etc/hxml/base-nodejs.hxml && chmod -R 777 data
scripts.clean: rm -rf data/computejobs/* ; rm -rf data/registry/* ; rm -rf data/ServiceStorageLocalFileSystem/*
scripts.stack: docker-compose rm -fv && docker-compose build && docker-compose up
scripts.tests.docker: docker run -p 8219:8219 -e "DOCKER=true" -e "VAGRANT=false" -e "REDIS=false" -e "AWS=false" --rm -v `pwd`:/app -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock ccctests haxe -debug test/testsIntegration.hxml | bunyan
scripts.tests.docker.redis: docker run -p 8219:8219 -e "DOCKER=true" -e "VAGRANT=false" -e "REDIS=true" -e "AWS=false" --rm -v `pwd`:/app -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock ccctests haxe -debug test/testsIntegration.hxml | bunyan
scripts.tests.vagrant: UNIT=false DOCKER=false AWS=false haxe -debug test/testsIntegration.hxml | bunyan
scripts.logdev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.logging.yml rm -fv && docker-compose -f docker-compose.logging.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.logging.yml up
scripts.stack.noserver2: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker-compose.override.localdev.yml rm -fv redis registry fluentd elasticsearch kibana && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker-compose.override.localdev.yml build redis registry fluentd elasticsearch kibana && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml -f docker-compose.override.localdev.yml up redis registry fluentd elasticsearch kibana
scripts.stack.noserver: docker-compose rm -fv redis registry fluentd elasticsearch kibana && docker-compose build redis registry fluentd elasticsearch kibana && docker-compose up redis registry fluentd elasticsearch kibana
